GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
md: Don't set mddev private to NULL in raid0 pers->free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit b7a51df785031cc49caf1c59766ca89cfa97b54b, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 0c031fd37f69deb0cd8c43bbfcfccd62ebd7e952. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: md: Don't set mddev private to NULL in raid0 pers->free
